oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Names given to animals by the |xam, including notes on who uses them (men or women, children and so on). This includes the anteater (its other name), the springbok, the ostrich, the eland (called 'meat' by men), and the hartebeest. This story also includes information about a man whom |hanâ‰ kass'o knew, who possessed 'leanness' (or ).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The names of animals
